member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.TemporaryResources
member.summary: Access to temporary files. Default temporary folder is created at Revenj/Temp subfolder in system temporary folder Can be overridden with configuration settings: TemporaryPath

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.TemporaryResources.CreateFile(System.String)
member.summary: Create file with specified extension. File will be created in configured temporary folder.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.TemporaryResources.TempFile(System.String)
member.summary: Create file in temporary folder with specified name.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.TemporaryResources.LoadAssembly(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Load assembly from provided stream. Assembly will be loaded into current AppDomain. Assembly will be saved to temporary folder and loaded from there.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.TemporaryResources.LoadDynamicAssembly(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Load assembly from provided content. Assembly will be loaded into current AppDomain. Assembly will be saved to dynamic temporary folder and loaded from there.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.TemporaryResources.CloneFile(System.String)
member.summary: Create copy of the file in the temporary folder.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.TemporaryResources.CreateRandomObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Create instance of specified type and populate it with random values.

member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.AssemblyScanner
member.summary: Utility for scanning and loading assemblies in current AppDomain. Microsoft-specific assemblies will be skipped.

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.AssemblyScanner.AllAssemblies
member.summary: Cache for

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.AssemblyScanner.AllTypes
member.summary: Cache for

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.AssemblyScanner.GetAssemblies
member.summary: Gets all referenced assemblies from current AppDomain, excluding dynamic or Microsoft-specific assemblies. Assemblies will be cached after first call.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.AssemblyScanner.GetAllTypes
member.summary: Get all types from assemblies. Types will be cached after first call.

member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.TypeUtility
member.summary: Utility for working with reflection

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.TypeUtility.GetTypeHierarchy(System.Type)
member.summary: Get type hierarchy for specified type. All interfaces and base types will be returned. Result will be cached.
member.returns: all implemented interfaces and base types

member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.PdfConverter
member.summary: Utility for converting files to PDF. External PdfConverter utility will be invoked for conversion. Path to PdfConverter can't have whitespaces in it (since tool will be invoked using cmd.exe) PdfConverterTimeout specify maximum amount of time conversion can take (20 seconds by default).

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.PdfConverter.Convert(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Convert provided file content to PDF. Specify extension of the file.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.PdfConverter.Convert(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert provided stream content to PDF. Specify extension of the file

member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader
member.summary: Performant text reader. Should be reused whenever possible.

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.SmallBuffer
member.summary: Temporary small char buffer for reuse

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.CharBuffer
member.summary: Temporary char buffer for reuse

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.ByteBuffer
member.summary: Temporary byte buffer for reuse (1024 bytes total)

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.LargeTempBuffer
member.summary: Temporary large temp buffer for reuse (32768 chars total)

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.#ctor(System.IO.TextReader,System.Char[],System.Char[])
member.summary: Allocate reader by reusing part of the buffers and providing original reader object.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.#ctor(System.String,System.Char[],System.Char[])
member.summary: Allocate reader by reusing part of the buffers and providing original string object

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Reuse(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Reuse existing instance with a new reader

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Reuse(System.String)
member.summary: Reuse existing instance with a new string

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Peek
member.summary: Read next char without changing position. Will return -1 on end of input

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Read
member.summary: Read next char and move a single position Will return -1 on end of input

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Read(System.Int32)
member.summary: Skip several chars and read only the last one. Don't use return value if total == 0 Moves position by specified argument

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.InitBuffer
member.summary: Reset buffer to starting position. Buffer should be used to fill in small values which will be reconstructed after

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.InitBuffer(System.Char)
member.summary: Reset buffer to starting position and specify initial value. Buffer should be used to fill in small values which will be reconstructed after

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.FillUntil(System.Char)
member.summary: Fill buffer until specified char is found. If end of input is detected, but char is not found, SerializationException will be thrown.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.FillUntil(System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Fill buffer until any of the specified chars is found. If end of input is detected, but chars are not found, SerializationException will be thrown.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.FillUntil(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Fill provided writer until any of the specified chars is found. If end of input is detected, but chars are not found, SerializationException will be thrown.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.AddToBuffer(System.Char)
member.summary: Append char to internal buffer.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.BufferMatches(System.String)
member.summary: Check if buffer matches provided string. Used as string comparison without new string allocation.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.BufferHash
member.summary: Current buffer hash. Used as string hashcode without allocating new string. Doesn't match string hashcode algorithm.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.BufferToString
member.summary: Convert buffer to new string

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.BufferToValue``1(System.Func{System.Char[],System.Int32,``0})
member.summary: Convert buffer to an instance

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.BufferToValue``1(System.Func{System.Char[],System.Int32,Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader,``0})
member.summary: Convert buffer to an instance

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.ReadUntil(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Fill target char[] until specified char is found. If end of input is detected, but char is not found, SerializationException will be thrown.
member.param: fill target array starting from specified position

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.ReadUntil(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Fill target char[] until any of the specified chars is found. If end of input is detected, but chars are not found, SerializationException will be thrown.
member.param: fill target array starting from specified position

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.ReadNumber(System.Char[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Fill target char[] while number chars are found. If end of input is detected, but chars are not found, SerializationException will be thrown.
member.param: fill target array starting from specified position

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Read(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fill target char[] starting at specified index and up to specified count. Returns how many chars were copied or -1 on end of input. Method is allowed to stop early if current buffer end is encountered.
member.param: fill target array starting from specified position
member.returns: how many chars were copied or -1 for immediate end of input

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.ReadBlock(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fill target char[] starting at specified index and up to specified count. Returns how many chars were copied or -1 on end of input. Method is not allowed to stop early if current buffer end is encountered. Must read all available chars up to specified count
member.param: fill target array starting from specified position
member.returns: how many chars were copied or -1 for immediate end of input

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.ReadLine
member.summary: Read a single line from input.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.ReadToEnd
member.summary: Read input to end and convert to string

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Close
member.summary: Close provided reader

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose provided reader

member.name: P:Revenj.Utility.BufferedTextReader.Position
member.summary: Current position. Sum of total processed buffers and position in the current buffer.

member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.Exceptions
member.summary: Utility for exception reporting. Check if application debug mode is enabled. Unroll exceptions in better description.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.Exceptions.GetMessages(System.Exception)
member.summary: Get messages for this exception. Unroll exception stack to single message. Aggregate exceptions will be unrolled too. Only exception message is used.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.Exceptions.GetDetailedExplanation(System.Exception)
member.summary: Get detailed messages for this exception. Unroll exception stack to single message. Aggregate exceptions will be unrolled too. Whole stack trace will be used for each exception.

member.name: P:Revenj.Utility.Exceptions.DebugMode
member.summary: Check if application is running in debug mode. Set in application config (configuration/appSettings) as <add key="ApplicationMode" value="Debug"/>

member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.DynamicOrderBy
member.summary: Utility class for conversion from dynamic order to static order.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.DynamicOrderBy.OrderBy``1(System.Linq.IQueryable{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Order by provided properties using specified direction. Properties (or paths) are specified as string.

member.name: T:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream
member.summary: In memory stream with 8192 blocks to avoid LOH issues. Since .NET places objects larger that 85000 bytes into LOH, avoid it as much as possible by using list of smaller blocks.

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.SmallBuffer
member.summary: Temporary small char buffer for reuse (64 chars)

member.name: F:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.CharBuffer
member.summary: Temporary char buffer for reuse (8192*4/3 + 2 chars)

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Create
member.summary: Create or get a new instance of memory stream Stream is bound to thread and must be released from the same thread

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Static
member.summary: Create reusable stream. Disposing the stream only has the effect of resetting it.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.#ctor
member.summary: Create new empty stream Stream is bound to thread and must be released from the same thread

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Create in memory stream based on another stream. Provided stream will not be disposed.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create in memory stream based on another stream. Specify whether should provided stream be disposed after copying.
member.param: reset provided stream to original position

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Flush
member.summary: Flush stream. Does nothing.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.ReadByte
member.summary: Read a single byte

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read buffer from the stream. Can return less then specified count if remaining block size is less than specified count

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Seek to position in the stream.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Reset
member.summary: Set length and position to 0

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: Set new length of the stream. Adjusts the current position if new length is larger then it.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Matches(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Check if stream starts with provided byte[] and matches it's length Provided byte[] must be smaller than 8192 bytes

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Write byte to stream. Advances current position by one. Adds a new block if necessary.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write buffer to stream. Advances current position by count. Increases length if necessary. New blocks will be added as required. It's best to use buffer of size 8192

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Equals(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Compare two streams. Length and content will be compared.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.ToBase64Stream
member.summary: Convert stream to Base 64 String representation in stream.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.ToBase64Writer(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Convert stream to Base 64 String representation in the provided writer.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.ToPostgresBytea(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Convert stream to Postgres representation of bytea

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.CopyTo(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Optimized version of copy to stream

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Send(System.Net.Sockets.Socket)
member.summary: Send entire stream to provided socket.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.GetWriter
member.summary: Reuse same text writer on this stream.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.GetReader
member.summary: Reuse same text reader on this stream.

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.UseBufferedReader(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Reuse buffered text reader associated with this stream. Provide input text reader as data source. Buffered text reader will be initialized with provided input

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.UseBufferedReader(System.String)
member.summary: Reuse buffered text reader associated with this stream. Provide input string as data source. Buffered text reader will be initialized with provided input

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Close
member.summary: Close current stream. Stream will be added to pool if required. Doesn't release allocated buffers

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose current stream. Stream will be added to pool if required. Used to reset position and length. Doesn't release allocated buffers

member.name: M:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.ToString
member.summary: Show content of the stream as string

member.name: P:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.CanRead
member.summary: Can this stream be read? Always true

member.name: P:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.CanSeek
member.summary: Can this stream be sought? Always true

member.name: P:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Can this stream be written to? Always true

member.summary: Get the length of the stream.

member.name: P:Revenj.Utility.ChunkedMemoryStream.Position
member.summary: Current position in the stream.

member.summary: Hash code utility. Stable hash code across versions and architectures
